evidence.claim: Zappy Health utilizes AWS Lambda for scalable serverless computing.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards for health data.
Zappy employs FHIR APIs to facilitate health data interoperability.
Integration with EHR systems is enabled through RESTful web services standards.
The platform leverages AWS for cloud storage and data management solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found linking Zappy Health to X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities.
